소셜 고객 의견 데이터 Top키워드 블로그
수동

activities.name: API REQ INFO
activities.description: API 호출 정보를 가져오기 위해 설정 파일에서 Date을 읽어옵니다.

activities.name: get page
activities.description: 대표 제품의 생성 기간동안 토탈 건수

source.query:
WITH v_seq AS 
 (
 	select   generate_series( '1', '5', 1  ) AS num 
 )
 select  to_char(to_date(c.max_date,'YYYYMMDD') + interval '7 day' * a.num,'YYYYMMDD') as date, b.b_num as weekFxrtTpcd      
FROM v_seq a, (SELECT UNNEST (ARRAY['1','2'] ) AS b_num )b,
(select  max(aplybgndt) AS max_date FROM cd_ods.tb_apis_retrieve_trif_fxrtinfo) c
;

SELECT to_char(generate_series(max(c.date)::date + INTERVAL '1 day', now() - INTERVAL '1 day', '1 day')::date,'YYYYMMDD') AS DATE
,A.pum_cd
, A.pum_nm
, A.unit_qty
, A.unit_cd
, B.MARKET
FROM cd_ods.tb_at_auctionitem_qty_distribution_master A,
(SELECT  UNNEST(ARRAY['1','3']) AS MARKET) B,
cd_ods.tb_at_auctionitem_qty_distribution c
GROUP BY A.pum_cd
, A.pum_nm
, A.unit_qty
, A.unit_cd
, B.MARKET
;

select to_char(now(),'YYYYMMDD') as date
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '1 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '7 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p7
,'garak' as market
FROM cd_ods.tb_garak_pricebyitemgrade_intermediary
union
select 
to_char(now(),'YYYYMMDD') as date
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '1 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '7 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p7
,'yanggok' as market
FROM cd_ods.tb_garak_pricebyitemgrade_intermediary
order by date;
